name: Violet Delight
description: Violet Delight is an indica-dominant strain that delivers exactly what its name promises: a loud burst of floral flavor that can only be compared to the aroma of a violet. Glance at this hybrid’s terpene profile and you’ll notice high levels of linalool, a flowery-smelling terpene that promotes relaxation and stress-relief. While driven by indica genetics, Violet Delight isn’t overwhelmingly sedating for most consumers. Instead, you’ll likely find yourself in a clear, focused headspace conducive for meditation or introverted activities. For the extroverts, this hybrid offers a giggly, lighthearted mood that keeps you active and engaged in social settings.
descriptionPlain: Violet Delight is an indica-dominant strain that delivers exactly what its name promises: a loud burst of floral flavor that can only be compared to the aroma of a violet. Glance at this hybrid’s terpene profile and you’ll notice high levels of linalool, a flowery-smelling terpene that promotes relaxation and stress-relief. While driven by indica genetics, Violet Delight isn’t overwhelmingly sedating for most consumers. For the extroverts, this hybrid offers a giggly, lighthearted mood that keeps you active and engaged in social settings.

highlightedReviews.text: Such a beautiful strain. Very aromatic and has a great fruity flavor to it. Most importantly..took away the stress and anxiety the day brings. Aquired at Green Sky Collective. Top Shelf bud for sure. Especially when rolled up ✌

Mysterious, delicious, consciously cultivated by the Artesians over at CascadiaElevatedAgriculture. This spunky little number is Oregon grown and bursting with character. Reminiscent of a late 90's rap video the nug was bling-blinging with trichomes with a terpene profile evocative of Auntie Sadies Sunday perfume. Heavy notes of (less intoxi...enjoyable) purple flowers and filling mouthfeel make this an ideal precursor for Canna and Chill.

articles.title: Valentine’s Day: Pair Your Sweetheart’s Bouquet With a Floral Cannabis Strain
articles.author: Hannah Meadows
articles.text:
With romance filling the air this time of year, it’s time to show your loved ones how much you appreciate them. If you’re thinking of surprising someone close with a bouquet of fragrant flowers, consider going one step further and pairing that gorgeous bunch of buds with our pick of bud.
Roses: Rose Bud

A dozen fresh red roses are the staple around this love-soaked holiday. Pair your own bouquet with the indica Rose Bud and let your sweetheart slip into its “relaxing buzz with a pleasant mental sizzle.”
Lavender: Lavender

Soothing and romantic, the lavender flower is the essential bloom for a  peaceful night in. Nab a bunch of fragrant lavender stems and sneak in a couple of indica Lavender nugs to provide the ultimate relaxation duo.
Orange Blossoms: Orange Blossom

Orange blossom flowers are a known aphrodisiac, and when you pick up a hefty handful, make sure to pick up the hybrid Orange Blossom as well. It smells of fresh-squeezed oranges and delivers a carefree euphoric vibe.
Violets: Violet Delight

For the anti-red and pink Valentine’s Day lover, you can’t go wrong with a pot of deep purple violets. Hide the hybrid Violet Delight among the leaves for a “light-hearted” and giggle-inducing night.
General Bouquet: Super Sweet

If you prefer to go for a mixed bouquet, pair a variety of flowers with the tried and true hybrid Super Sweet. Its “floral candy-like aroma” will nestle perfectly into the beautiful bouquet in hand.

articles.title: Taste the 'Strainbow' With These Colorful Cannabis Pairings
articles.author: Hannah Meadows
articles.text:
For every color in the rainbow there is a complementing strain ready to match each individual’s absolute favorite hue. Only drink out of blue cups? Wear a lot of purple?  Refuse to eat something that isn’t orange-tinted? Pair your number one color with a little bit of green! Below we list a strain pairing that goes hand in hand with each letter in ROYGBIV.
Red

Fiery, passionate, sensual – red is a power color that tends to allure the sexes and could possibly give you a promotion. Pair this magnetic color with the “speedy and intense” Panama Red, a full sativa that will match that flash of red lipstick or vibrant watch band.
Orange

This warm and fizzy hue can only pair best with a warm and fizzy strain. Enter Orange Crush – its sweet and tangy flavor perfectly complements its twin color.
Yellow

In the dead of winter, yellow reminisces sunny days and lemonade. Try Lemon Haze to melt the frost – it’s a citrusy sativa whose buds appear green and yellow. The lemony taste will bring back your sunny disposition through these chilly months.
Green

With 2017’s color of the year being “greenery,” the hybrid Green Dream is an excellent addition to any green stash.
Blue

Blue has always been a fan favorite and possibly the most popular color of the rainbow – it’s calming, tranquil, and makes one think of the sky and the sea. The hybrid ArcticBlue pairs well with this peaceful color and its anti-anxiety effects.
Honorable mention goes to the hybrid Blue Dream, a strain that has become just as popular as the color itself.
Indigo

Indigo is the in-between of purple and blue – a deep, gorgeous hue that can only be complemented by the hybrid strain Blurple. It’s the best mix of Blue Dream and Mendocino Purps, just as indigo is the best mix of purple and blue, aka “blurple.”
Violet

A color that received its name from the violet flower, it’s only logical to pair this beautiful hue with the hybrid strain Violet Delight. It releases a strong floral flavor that will have you dreaming in shades of purple.
If your favorite color is outside of the rainbow spectrum, we have a couple of honorary mentions for you to pick up.

Pink

Though pink is not technically a color of the rainbow, we couldn’t leave out this bubblegum pop favorite. Pair that Pepto-Bismol toned jacket that’s been collecting dust in your closet with the sweet and fruity indica Pink Berry.
Black

For those who live and breathe in waves of black, don’t pass up the indica Black Domina. It’s a strain designed for late night, so grab your best black pajamas, black slippers, black robe, and pull in this heavy strain deep into the night.
